scripts.setup: (docker compose -f docker-compose-setup.yaml up -d) && (docker build --tag=watchdock:latest .) && (docker extension install watchdock:latest) && ( docker extension dev debug watchdock )
scripts.rebuild: (//add a command to clear the docker daemon of our containers and images and volumes for this)(docker build --tag=watchdock:latest .) && (docker extension update watchdock:latest) && ( docker extension dev debug watchdock )
